replies.message: Hi Daniel, we’re proud to say that all of our packaging in GB is 100% recyclable from the caps down to the glue we use on our labels and has been since 2012. For the last five years, we’ve been using 25% recycled plastic across all our brands, a figure we want to increase to 50% by 2020, but there’s not enough recycled plastic to go beyond that in Great Britain at the moment. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates. We also use PlantBottle for all of our Honest and glaceau smartwater bottles in Great Britain, it’s the first-ever fully recyclable PET plastic bottle made partially from plants and we’re always looking at ways that we can expand its use across our portfolio.
